short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension saves your fav links to download them as a '.txt' file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension is an easy-to-use tool that lets you efficiently manage your important links. With this extension, you can:

Save links manually or with a single click from your active browser tab.
Quickly view and access all your saved links in a well-organized list.
Download your links as a text file, with the option to customize the file name.
Delete your entire list of links with a double-click, perfect for starting fresh.
Your list of links is stored locally in your browser, ensuring itâ€™s always available without relying on the internet or external services. Keep your essential resources just a click away!
